title: Egypt’s e-commerce platform Wasla nabs $9 million from retail finance provider Contact - TechCrunch
content: Egypt’s e-commerce platform Wasla nabs $9 million from retail finance provider Contact  TechCrunch
description: Contact Financial Holding, Egypt’s non-bank consumer finance provider, has invested $9 million in the country’s ecommerce super-app Wasla, setting the stage for the rollout of new online shopping capabilities, products and regional expansion. Contact has been in the business of consumer finance sin…
